Question: IoT M2M Council CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
CES 2024 Product Highlight and Specification:

1NCE IoT Flat Rate
- Offers secure and reliable cellular connectivity in over 100 countries
- Supports communication standards like 2G/4G, NB-IoT, and more
- Designed for affordable and scalable IoT applications

Blues Wireless Notecard
- Highly secure SoM with embedded global cellular connectivity
- Pre-paid connectivity and consumption-based pricing
- Enterprise use cases range from asset tracking to AI at the edge

Quectel Cellular IoT Modules
- Leading supplier of cellular IoT modules and antennas
- Powers digital innovation for convenient, efficient, and secure life

Telit Cinterion
- Provides complete solutions for connected devices
- Offers wireless communication and positioning modules, cellular MVNO connectivity plans, and IoT platforms

Digi International
- Provides mission-critical M2M and IoT connectivity solutions
- Offers secure, high-performance, centrally managed connectivity and IT solutions

floLIVE Global Data Network
- Operates the first and largest global, hyperlocal data network
- Provides centrally-managed local connectivity for any device, anywhere

iBASIS Global Access for Things
- Delivers single source cellular IoT access worldwide
- Simplifies IoT connection through a unified platform for seamless, remote, programmable, and secure communication

Ignion IoT Antenna Hardware
- Offers revolutionary antenna products and ground-breaking cloud service
- Assembles leading R&D and engineering team for IoT wireless connectivity

KORE IoT Solutions
- Delivers mission-critical IoT solutions and services
- Empowers organizations to improve operational and business results by simplifying the complexity of IoT
Summary_cn:
2024 CES产品亮点与规格：

1NCE物联网平价套餐
- 在100多个国家提供安全可靠的蜂窝网络连接
- 支持2G/4G、NB-IoT等通信标准
- 专为可负担和可扩展的物联网应用而设计

Blues Wireless Notecard
- 高度安全的片上模块，内置全球蜂窝网络连接
- 预付费连接和按量计费
- 企业应用范围从资产追踪到边缘人工智能

Quectel蜂窝物联网模块
- 蜂窝物联网模块和天线的领先供应商
- 为便捷、高效、安全的生活提供数字创新动力

Telit Cinterion
- 为连接设备提供完整解决方案
- 提供无线通信和定位模块、蜂窝网络虚拟运营商连接计划和物联网平台

Digi International
- 提供关键任务的机器到机器和物联网连接解决方案
- 提供安全、高性能、集中管理的连接和IT解决方案

floLIVE全球数据网络
- 运营全球首个最大的超本地数据网络
- 为任何地点的任何设备提供集中管理的本地连接

iBASIS全球物联网接入
- 提供全球单一源物联网蜂窝接入
- 通过统一平台实现无缝、远程、可编程和安全的物联网连接

Ignion物联网天线硬件
- 提供革命性的天线产品和突破性的云服务
- 集结领先的研发和工程团队，为物联网无线连接提供支持

KORE物联网解决方案
- 提供关键任务的物联网解决方案和服务
- 通过简化物联网的复杂性，赋能组织改善运营和业务结果
